鱦字的基本解释

鱦
yìng
小鱼。

鱦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yìng］
［《廣韻》以證切，去證，以。］
［《廣韻》實證切，去證，船。］
［《廣韻》食陵切，平蒸，船。］
［《廣韻》莫杏切，上梗，明。］
小鱼。
[②]［shéng］
［《集韻》神陵切，平蒸，船。］
鱼子。

鱦字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱦； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1479第13
【廣韻】食陵切【集韻】神陵切，?音繩。【爾雅·釋魚】鱦，小魚。【註】今江東亦呼魚子未成者爲鱦。【家語】宓子賤仕魯，爲單父宰，孔子使巫馬期往觀政焉。入界，見䰻得魚輒捨之。期問焉，曰：魚之大者名爲鱄鱨，吾大夫愛之，其小者名鱦，吾大夫欲長之，是以得二者輒舍之。【玉篇】同䱆。又【廣韻】實證切，音乗。又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?以證切，音孕。義?同。又【廣韻】莫幸切，音猛。蛙屬。又【集韻】母耿切，音黽。義同。

鱦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鱦字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［yìng］
["Guangyun" cuts with evidence, goes to prove, with. ]
["Guangyun" empirically cut, verify, ship. ]
["Guangyun" Shiling cut, flat steamed, boat. ]
["Guangyun" Mo Xingqie, top stem, Ming. ]

roe.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鱦; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1479 13
[Guang Yun] Shi Ling cut [Ji Yun] Shen Ling cut, sound rope. 【Erya·Shiyu】Li, small fish. [Note] Today Jiangdong also calls the unsuccessful caviar as 鱦. [Family language] Mi Zi is inferior to Shi Lu, and is the only father slaughter. Confucius made the Wuma period go to Guanzhengyan. When you enter the world, you will find yourself at home. I asked Yan, saying: The big fish is called Popo, which my doctor loves, and the small one is called Popo. My doctor wants to grow up, so I can give up both. 【Jade articles】Same as the same. Also [Guangyun] empirical cut, sound multiplication. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? To prove the cut, the sound is pregnant. Righteous? Same. [Guang Yun] Mo Xing cut, the sound is fierce. Rana. Also 【Jiyun】Mother Gengqie, sound strider. The same meaning.
